name: App Store Intelligence API
description: Apple App Store search, app lookup, top charts, and similar apps discovery via iTunes API. $0.005/query via x402.
longDescription: Comprehensive App Store intelligence using Apple's iTunes Search API. Search apps across all categories, lookup detailed app info by Track ID or Bundle ID, get top apps by genre (20 categories), and discover similar apps. Returns structured JSON with ratings, reviews, price, developer info, screenshots, release notes, and size. Ideal for competitive analysis, market research, and app discovery automation.
whyMobileProxy: Apple rate-limits iTunes API calls from datacenter IPs and blocks automated scraping of App Store pages. Mobile proxies provide residential IPs that bypass rate limits and geo-restrictions, enabling reliable access to country-specific app data, top charts, and ratings that vary by region.

competitors.name: iTunes Search API (direct)
competitors.notes: Rate limited (20/min), no top charts, no similar apps

competitiveContext.ourAdvantage: App Store intelligence via x402 micropayments. No API key, no subscription, $0.005/query. Includes search, lookup, top charts, and similar apps in one API.
